Summary: thought was dim satelite then lit up 3 times red orange color
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Alexandria
There were no other sightings in Alexandria on or around July 31st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was probably a satelite but I found it odd watching it for about 3 minutes, it was dim, but then it lit up about twice the brightness of the north star (polaris). The strange thing is the object, again probably a satelite, lit up 3 times from being so dim that I could hardly see it, to a reddish orange color and was very visible. Traveled in a staight line just like a satelite and about the same distance as one. No clouds and yes I have seen them disappear from the lack of sunlight, not the case. Strange, 3 mins and lit up 3 times in an odd color. That's it, not a major sighting, good reading and who knows? Thanks
